Detailed Description

Wrapper for ChipStream objects that makes them into DataTransform objects.

Definition at line 52 of file ChipStreamDataTransform.h.

Member Function Documentation

virtual std::string ChipStreamDataTransform::getName (  )  [inline, virtual]

Core API.

Take in a blackboard, a data store and output an updated blackboard and possibly modified data store. This class will use the ChipStream object it wraps to do the actual numerics and handles the blackboard as well as marshalling data in and out of the data store.

Parameters:
board Blackboard state input, to be updated as dictated by transform
in Intensity level data to be transformed
out Any intensity data post transform

Implements DataTransform.
